last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: Law enforcers deploy an unprecedented raid by land, sea and air across Campo de Gibraltar. It's election day in La Línea: Will Juan Franco be reelected?

name: La Línea: Shadow of Narco
original_name: La Linea: La sombra del narco
overview: Go inside La Línea, the Spanish beach town turned into Europe's drug trafficking hub, and meet the law enforcement officials determined to change that.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In La Línea, drug clans act with impunity. The town's police force and its mayor, Juan Franco, detail how their home became a smuggling hot spot.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A brazen act from a drug clan triggers the Spanish government to reinforce the war against drugs. An important arrest provokes more gang violence.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: An ex-smuggler recounts how she ended up on the wrong side of the law. A flamenco performance in the heart of La Línea shows another facet of the town.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Law enforcers deploy an unprecedented raid by land, sea and air across Campo de Gibraltar. It's election day in La Línea: Will Juan Franco be reelected?
